revised_title: Contribution to the History of Pleiocene and Pleistocene Deer
tldr: This article presents a historical overview of the Pleiocene and Pleistocene deer species, focusing on the taxonomy and evolution of Cervus Dawkinsi (Newton) and Alces latifrons (Dawkins). The author discusses the findings from various studies and fossils, providing insights into the geological and paleontological aspects of these deer species.
